briefTitle: Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Intravenous Sulbactam-ETX2514 in the Treatment of Patients With Infections Caused by Acinetobacter Baumannii-calcoaceticus Complex

outcomeMeasures.title: Proportion of Patients With All-Cause Mortality in CRABC m-MITT Population
outcomeMeasures.description: The primary efficacy endpoint for the study is 28-day all-cause mortality in the CRABC m-MITT population in Part A.

outcomeMeasures.title: Proportion of Patients With Nephrotoxicity
outcomeMeasures.description: The primary safety endpoint for the study is nephrotoxicity, as measured by the Risk-Injury-Failure-Loss-End-stage renal disease (RIFLE) criteria, in the MITT population in Part A.
